chunk:
Circadia Vitamin Veil Facial Cleansing Oil

Brand: Circadia

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Isopropyl Palmitate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, PEG-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Eugenol, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin,

Polysorbate 20, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance (Parfum), Linalool, Limonene, Hexyl Cinnamal, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Citronellol, Geraniol, Eugenol, Farnesol, Benzyl Benzoate, Coumarin, Isoeugenol.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
